creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
another entity resolver bug, this time in the page envelope input module


An Error Occurred org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException Exception in
ServerPagesGenerator.generate() org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Exception
in ServerPagesGenerator.generate():
org.apache.avalon.framework.CascadingRuntimeException: Error accessing attribute
'document-dc-title' from input module 'page-envelope'. Getting attribute for
name [document-dc-title] failed:
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DocumentException:
java.net.UnknownHostException: www.w3.org Original Exception:
org.apache.avalon.framework.CascadingRuntimeException: Error accessing attribute
'document-dc-title' from input module 'page-envelope'. Getting attribute for

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
i could not reproduce it. maybe because we made an effort to get rid of doctype
declarations?
